name: Paragon Air Adventures, LLC
about: Paragon Air Adventures, LLC, based in Belgrade, Montana, is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing professional teaching, customized training solutions, and impeccable customer service. Founded by Tom Nagorski, who brings 35 years of flying experience and over 5,500 hours of flight instruction, the school specializes in taking students beyond basic memorization to the advanced level of "Correlation," where pilots are skilled, safe, and critically thinking. Paragon offers a wide range of training programs, including private, instrument, commercial, and multi-engine ratings, as well as specialized training in mountain flying and aerobatics. The school also provides additional services such as aircraft rental, pilot supplies, and business aviation support. With a focus on safety, entertainment, and lifelong learning, Paragon Air Adventures is committed to being part of your aviation adventure.
